name: doorknob licking tournament 2010
description:
Here's the last game in the trilogy. This one took me a while to make. I stopped working on it for a whole year, almost cancelling it entirely. But then I decided to finish it just for the hell of it. I'm surprised this series even lasted this long, or that I even had improv skills like this to begin with. This is the longest game in the series, and probably the one with the most content. I'm never making one of these games again.

Also be warned, this game has some spicy swears sprinkled in it. Don't tell your christian minecraft server about this one.
